title: 3 and Out - NFL's Brady/Belichick Void; Philly vs. Dallas Deals; Gurley Cut; Cam Limbo; Headlines; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - NFL's Brady/Belichick Void; Philly vs. Dallas Deals; Gurley Cut; Cam Limbo; Headlines; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff dives into Brady's decision to leave Belichick for the Bucs, the void that's left for the NFL now that they've split, why Philly's smarter approach to contracts gives them the long-term advantage over Dallas in the NFC East, his thoughts on the Rams moving on from Todd Gurley, Cam Newton being left in limbo in Carolina. He also runs down other headlines and transactions from around the league, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
